parameters.name: CommandID
parameters.description: Command ID of the command whose parent menu's name you want

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Document types in which this command exists as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: ParentMenuName
parameters.description: Name of the parent menu of the specified menu command

title: ISldWorks.GetMenuStrings
description: Gets the name of the parent menu of the specified menu command.
signature:
System.String GetMenuStrings( 
   System.Int32
CommandID
,
   System.Int32
DocumentType
,
   out System.String
ParentMenuName
)

parameters.name: CommandID
parameters.description: Command ID of the command whose parent menu's name you want

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Document types in which this command exists as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: ParentMenuName
parameters.description: Name of the parent menu of the specified menu command

remarks:
Use this method with methods that require you to supply the name of the menu, such as
ISldWorks::RemoveMenu
,
IFrame::RenameMenu
and
IFrame::RemoveMenu
.
